Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

"Reconsturction complete." the computer stated. "Releasing new
Decepticons." it again said. Both CR chambres opened, and inhumane
growls could be heard from both. Then with heavy thuds, a large
Mechanical horse stomped out, smoke protruding from where it's eyes
should have been, and it's mouth. It bent down, so as to fit throught
the rest of the chambre, and as it was out, unfolded large skeletal like
wings, as it lifted it's front feet off the ground, then stomped them
down, causing the ship to shake from the sheer weight. It contineud to
spit up dust.

Then from the other chambre, a whirl of blue and red spun out at a
lighting quick speed, landing on the wall. At and angle hanging off of
the wall, an anamalistic growl began to laugh and cackle, it sounded
like three different types of animals at once, and grated like glass on
a chalk board. It was a mechanical Hyena, both eyes flaring blood red,
as oil began to drip of it's razor sharp fangs, talons protruded
everywhere, some were slicing into the wall as he laughed. He then leapt
again to the ground, and paced around Longhaul, growling, his one eye,
whirling in and out at the Constructicons.

OOC: Okay guys, I'm off.
